title: Exquisite Diamond Mangalsutra - A Modern Twist on Tradition
materials: Crafted in 18K Rose Gold with meticulously hand-set Cubic Zirconia stones. Features high-quality black beads. Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting luster.
features: A delicate mangalsutra design with a contemporary flair. Features multiple diamond-studded pendants evenly spaced along the black beaded chain. The pendants are designed in a floral shape. The refined setting enhances the brilliance of the cubic zirconia.
colors: Rose Gold and black with sparkling white Cubic Zirconia stones.
occasions: Perfect for daily wear as a symbol of commitment
or for special occasions like anniversaries or traditional ceremonies. This also makes a beautiful gift for the modern bride.
description: A stunning fusion of tradition and modern aesthetics. The delicate design and sparkling cubic zirconia make it a versatile piece that can be worn every day. Symbolizes eternal love and commitment. Crafted with the highest quality materials for lasting durability.
